ScalarVariable.name: realExpression1.y
ScalarVariable.description: Value of Real output

ScalarVariable.name: realExpression2.y
ScalarVariable.description: Value of Real output

ScalarVariable.name: s1.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.activeSteps
ScalarVariable.description: Number of active steps in the CompositeStep

ScalarVariable.name: stateGraphRoot.subgraphStatePort.activeSteps
ScalarVariable.description: Number of active steps in the CompositeStep

ScalarVariable.name: stateGraphRoot.subgraphStatePort.activeStepsDummy
ScalarVariable.description: Dummy variable in order that connector fulfills restriction of connector

ScalarVariable.name: step1.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.activeSteps
ScalarVariable.description: Number of active steps in the CompositeStep

ScalarVariable.name: t1.t
ScalarVariable.description: = actual waiting time (transition will fire when t > waitTime)

ScalarVariable.name: t1.t_start
ScalarVariable.description: Time instant at which the transition would fire, if waitTime would be zero

ScalarVariable.name: t2.t
ScalarVariable.description: = actual waiting time (transition will fire when t > waitTime)

ScalarVariable.name: t2.t_start
ScalarVariable.description: Time instant at which the transition would fire, if waitTime would be zero

ScalarVariable.name: t1.waitTime
ScalarVariable.description: Wait time before transition fires

ScalarVariable.name: t2.waitTime
ScalarVariable.description: Wait time before transition fires

ScalarVariable.name: s1.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.activeStepsDummy
ScalarVariable.description: Dummy variable in order that connector fulfills restriction of connector

ScalarVariable.name: step1.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.activeStepsDummy
ScalarVariable.description: Dummy variable in order that connector fulfills restriction of connector

ScalarVariable.name: switch1.u1
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of first Real input signal

ScalarVariable.name: switch1.u3
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of second Real input signal

ScalarVariable.name: switch1.y
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of Real output signal

ScalarVariable.name: stateGraphRoot.activeSteps
ScalarVariable.description: Number of active steps within the stategraph

ScalarVariable.name: s1.nIn
ScalarVariable.description: Number of input connections

ScalarVariable.name: s1.nOut
ScalarVariable.description: Number of output connections

ScalarVariable.name: step1.nIn
ScalarVariable.description: Number of input connections

ScalarVariable.name: step1.nOut
ScalarVariable.description: Number of output connections

ScalarVariable.name: s1.localActive
ScalarVariable.description: = true if step is active, otherwise the step is not active

ScalarVariable.name: s1.newActive
ScalarVariable.description: Value of active in the next iteration

ScalarVariable.name: s1.oldActive
ScalarVariable.description: Value of active when CompositeStep was aborted

ScalarVariable.name: step1.active
ScalarVariable.description: = true if step is active, otherwise the step is not active

ScalarVariable.name: step1.localActive
ScalarVariable.description: = true if step is active, otherwise the step is not active

ScalarVariable.name: step1.newActive
ScalarVariable.description: Value of active in the next iteration

ScalarVariable.name: step1.oldActive
ScalarVariable.description: Value of active when CompositeStep was aborted

ScalarVariable.name: t1.condition
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition may fire (time varying expression)

ScalarVariable.name: t1.enableFire
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if all firing conditions are true

ScalarVariable.name: t2.condition
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition may fire (time varying expression)

ScalarVariable.name: t2.enableFire
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if all firing conditions are true

ScalarVariable.name: t2.fire
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition fires

ScalarVariable.name: t1.enableTimer
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if timer is enabled

ScalarVariable.name: t2.enableTimer
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if timer is enabled

ScalarVariable.name: s1.inPort[1].occupied
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.name: s1.inPort[1].set
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step is activated

ScalarVariable.name: s1.outPort[1].available
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.name: s1.outPort[1].reset
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step is deactivated

ScalarVariable.name: s1.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.resume
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if resume transition of CompositeStep fires

ScalarVariable.name: s1.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.suspend
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if suspend transition of CompositeStep fires

ScalarVariable.name: stateGraphRoot.subgraphStatePort.resume
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if resume transition of CompositeStep fires

ScalarVariable.name: stateGraphRoot.subgraphStatePort.suspend
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if suspend transition of CompositeStep fires

ScalarVariable.name: step1.inPort[1].occupied
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.name: step1.inPort[1].set
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step is activated

ScalarVariable.name: step1.outPort[1].available
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.name: step1.outPort[1].reset
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step is deactivated

ScalarVariable.name: step1.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.resume
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if resume transition of CompositeStep fires

ScalarVariable.name: step1.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.suspend
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if suspend transition of CompositeStep fires

ScalarVariable.name: switch1.u2
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of Boolean input signal

ScalarVariable.name: t1.fire
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition fires

ScalarVariable.name: t1.inPort.available
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step connected to the transition input is active

ScalarVariable.name: t1.inPort.reset
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and the step connected to the transition input is deactivated

ScalarVariable.name: t1.localCondition
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition may fire

ScalarVariable.name: t1.outPort.occupied
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step connected to the transition output is active

ScalarVariable.name: t1.outPort.set
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step connected to the transition output becomes active

ScalarVariable.name: t2.inPort.available
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step connected to the transition input is active

ScalarVariable.name: t2.inPort.reset
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and the step connected to the transition input is deactivated

ScalarVariable.name: t2.localCondition
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition may fire

ScalarVariable.name: t2.outPort.occupied
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step connected to the transition output is active

ScalarVariable.name: t2.outPort.set
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step connected to the transition output becomes active
